bug.author: xxAna
bug.summary: Why yolov3-tiny is much worser than yolov3?Doesn't it is for faster and just a little impact on performance?
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
A clear and concise description of what the bug is. <denchmark-h:h2>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. 2. 3. <denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. <denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. Desktop (please complete the following information):
OS: [e.g. iOS] Version [e.g. 22]

comments.comment: Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/xxAna>@xxAna</denchmark-link> , thank you for your interest in our work! Please visit our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/Train-Custom-Data>Custom Training Tutorial</denchmark-link> to get started, and see our <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1G8T-VFxQkjDe4idzN8F-hbIBqkkkQnxw>Google Colab Notebook</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://hub.docker.com/r/ultralytics/yolov3>Docker Image</denchmark-link> , and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/GCP-Quickstart>GCP Quickstart Guide</denchmark-link> for example environments. If this is a bug report, please provide screenshots and minimum viable code to reproduce your issue, otherwise we can not help you.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/xxAna>@xxAna</denchmark-link> you can see a mAP comparison here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3#map>https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3#map</denchmark-link>
yolov3-tiny has about 8X fewer parameters than yolov3-spp, so it is faster but performs worse naturally.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/glenn-jocher>@glenn-jocher</denchmark-link> Thank you again for your reply. I get it.
